description: Indicates that a signature (of the specified type) is needed when completing the QuestionnaireResponse.

element.comment:
If this appears at the Questionnaire level, then the signature will be gathered for the entire form when it is marked complete.  If it appears on a particular item, then it will be gathered on that question or group when it is filled in.  (E.g. seeking the user's initials beside certain questions.)

The signature can be captured using the http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/questionnaireresponse-signature extension.
element.definition: Indicates that a signature (of the specified type) is needed when completing the QuestionnaireResponse.

name: signatureRequired

The signature can be captured using the http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/questionnaireresponse-signature extension.

constraint.expression: hasValue() or (children().count() > id.count()) or $this is Parameters
constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children unless an empty Parameters resource

slicing.description: Extensions are always sliced by (at least) url

element.comment: The definition may point directly to a computable or human-readable definition of the extensibility codes, or it may be a logical URI as declared in some other specification. The definition SHALL be a URI for the Structure Definition defining the extension.
element.definition: Source of the definition for the extension code - a logical name or a URL.
element.short: identifies the meaning of the extension

element.definition: Value of extension - must be one of a constrained set of the data types (see [Extensibility](extensibility.html) for a list).
